home_description: With a strong focus on clean architecture and UX, I turn ideas into robust, scalable, and reusable web solutions.
about_developer_1: Originally trained in foreign languages, I found my true passion in web development, where logic, creativity, and structure meet. I'm especially drawn to building scalable, maintainable, and reusable solutions with a focus on clean code and clear architecture.
about_developer_2: I previously worked as a backend developer, mainly with PHP (Laravel), MySQL, and Docker. Outside of that role (and especially now) I enjoy diving into new technologies, exploring both frontend and backend stacks.
about_developer_3: While my journey began on the backend, I've developed a growing interest in frontend development, experimenting with React, Vue, SvelteKit, and basic UI design in Figma on personal projects.
about_developer_4: I constantly strive to improve, organizing code by responsibility, keeping functions focused, and automating wherever I can.
